item.title: 美国参议员斯科特在美联储主席提名遭遇阻挠之际表示，鲍威尔并非罪犯
item.description: 共和党参议员蒂姆·斯科特周三表示，他不认为美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔去年夏天向国会作证时触犯了法律，并表示若检察官前来询问，他会如此作证。【原文：Republican Senator Tim Scott on Wednesday said he does not believe Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell broke the law when he testified to Congress last summer, and would say that to any prosecutor who came asking.】

item.title: Telegram创始人杜罗夫称西班牙社交媒体计划将安全功能武器化
item.description: Telegram创始人帕维尔·杜罗夫周三公开谴责西班牙首相佩德罗·桑切斯计划禁止16岁以下青少年使用社交媒体，并因平台上的仇恨言论起诉高管的行为，此举与埃隆·马斯克的立场一致。【原文：Telegram founder Pavel Durov on Wednesday joined Elon Musk in publicly criticising plans by Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez to ban social media access for under 16s and to prosecute executives for hate speech on their platforms.】

item.title: 美国核电监管机构计划调整政策以配合特朗普政府对核反应堆的目标
item.description: 美国核能监管机构周三表示，正根据特朗普总统加快核反应堆许可审批的目标进行重组。【原文：The U.S. nuclear power regulator said on Wednesday it is undergoing a reorganization in line with President Donald Trump's goals on speeding up licensing of nuclear reactors.】

item.title: 软件抛售重创股市，逢低买盘消失
item.description: 周三软件板块的抛售潮持续加剧，未能吸引抄底者入场，以往屡次拯救科技股暴跌的逢低买入反应此次却明显缺席。【原文：The software sector's deepening selloff on Wednesday failed to lure bargain hunters, with the dip-buying reflex that has rescued countless tech routs conspicuously absent.】

item.title: 牙科行业或于2026年趋稳，但完全复苏仍遥遥无期，分析师称
item.description: 华尔街期待牙科产品制造商能为2026年描绘更光明的前景，但分析师指出，整个行业的全面复苏可能仍需时日。【原文：Wall Street is hoping dental-product makers will offer a brighter 2026 outlook, but analysts say a full industry rebound may still be some time away.】

item.title: 耐克因涉嫌歧视白人员工面临美国调查
item.description: 美国负责执行反职场歧视法律的机构周三在法庭文件中表示，正就耐克公司涉嫌通过多元化政策歧视白人一事展开调查。【原文：The U.S. agency that enforces laws banning workplace discrimination said in a court filing on Wednesday it is investigating Nike for allegedly discriminating against white people through its diversity policies.】

item.title: 外部审计师将监督石油资金流向委内瑞拉，贝森特表示
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周三向国会议员表示，美国财政部将引入外部审计机构，监督石油资金流向委内瑞拉的情况。【原文：The U.S. Treasury will bring in outside auditors to monitor the flow of oil funds to Venezuela, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent told lawmakers on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汽车制造商支持特朗普放宽燃油经济性标准的计划，但要求进行调整
item.description: 主要汽车制造商周三呼吁修改特朗普政府提出的燃油经济性标准改革方案，但表示支持大幅削减能效要求的计划。【原文：Major automakers on Wednesday called for changes in the Trump administration's proposal to reform fuel economy standards, but said they back the plan to drastically slash the efficiency requirements.】

item.title: 联合国儿童基金会呼吁将描绘儿童性虐待的人工智能内容定为刑事犯罪
item.description: 联合国儿童基金会周三呼吁各国将制作人工智能生成儿童性虐待内容的行为定为犯罪，称其对人工智能图像性化儿童数量增加的报道深感震惊。【原文：The United Nations children's agency UNICEF on Wednesday called for countries to criminalize the creation of AI-generated child sexual abuse content, saying it was alarmed by reports of an increase in the number of artificial intelligence images sexualizing children.】

item.title: First Brands创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯对欺诈指控表示不认罪
item.description: 汽车零部件供应商First Brands的创始人帕特里克·詹姆斯周三对指控表示不认罪，此前该公司破产倒闭前，他涉嫌欺诈贷款方数亿美元。【原文：Patrick James, the founder of auto parts supplier First Brands, pleaded not guilty on Wednesday to charges he defrauded lenders out of billions of dollars before the company collapsed into bankruptcy.】

item.title: 贝森特：美联储因通胀问题丧失美国民众信任，其独立性面临威胁
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周三表示，美联储的独立性建立在美国民众对该央行的信任之上，而美联储因放任通胀失控并"侵蚀"民众收入而丧失了这种信任。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday said that the independence of the Federal Reserve was based on Americans' trust of the central bank, which it lost because it allowed inflation to get out of control and "ravage" their incomes.】

item.title: 美国与墨西哥将就关键矿产制定协调贸易政策
item.description: 安德烈娅·沙拉尔【原文：By Andrea Shalal】

item.title: 超级碗为潜在的人工智能网络安全威胁做准备
item.description: 在新英格兰爱国者队与西雅图海鹰队于第六十届超级碗对决之前，李维斯体育场需要进行技术升级改造。【原文：Before the New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks face off at Super Bowl LX, Levi’s Stadium needed a tech upgrade package.】

item.title: Roblox推出人工智能技术，可通过自然语言生成可运行的模型
item.description: Roblox于周三推出一项人工智能技术，该技术能够通过自然语言指令生成完全可运行的游戏模型。该公司正积极运用机器学习技术，以吸引更多开发者加入其电子游戏平台。【原文：Roblox launched an artificial intelligence technology on Wednesday that can generate fully functioning in-game models using natural language prompts, as the company aggressively pursues machine learning to attract more developers to its videogame platform.】

item.title: 精神航空公司拟以3000万美元将芝加哥机场两个登机口转让给美联航
item.description: 据法庭文件显示，Spirit航空公司正向美国纽约南区破产法院申请批准，拟以3020万美元的价格将奥黑尔机场的两个登机口转让给美联航。【原文：Spirit Aviation is seeking court approval from the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the Southern District of New York to transfer two O'Hare airport gates to United Airlines for $30.2 million, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 独家报道：信诺保险达成联邦贸易委员会胰岛素诉讼和解，承诺全面改革药品定价机制
item.description: 据路透社获得的和解协议副本显示，信诺集团旗下艾伯维公司已就美国联邦贸易委员会对其胰岛素定价行为违反反垄断法和消费者保护法的指控达成和解，并同意实施旨在降低患者、保险公司和小药房成本的改革措施。【原文：Cigna Corp's Express Scripts has settled the U.S. Federal Trade Commission's claims its insulin pricing practices violated antitrust and consumer protection laws, and agreed to changes aimed at lowering costs for patients, insurers and small pharmacies, according to a copy of the settlement seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 初创公司EnFi完成1500万美元融资，将为银行部署人工智能信贷分析师代理
item.description: 总部位于波士顿的初创公司EnFi正通过风险投资基金筹集1500万美元资金，用于扩大人工智能代理的部署规模。这些代理能够分析信贷申请并作出决策。【原文：Boston-based startup EnFi is raising $15 million with venture capital funds to increase deployment of artificial intelligence agents that analyze and make decisions on credit applications.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商Cerebras Systems完成10亿美元后期融资
item.description: 人工智能芯片制造商Cerebras Systems周三宣布，在最新一轮后期融资中筹集了10亿美元资金，公司估值达到230亿美元。【原文：AI chip maker Cerebras Systems said on Wednesday it raised $1 billion in a late-stage funding round that valued it at $23 billion.】

item.title: 特朗普将《非洲增长与机会法案》延期一年，分析师称此举虽短暂却脆弱，为贸易带来喘息之机
item.description: 分析人士指出，美国将非洲优惠贸易计划延长一年，仅能为该大陆带来短暂喘息之机。鉴于两国外交关系紧张，南非能否继续享受该计划仍悬而未决。【原文：Washington's one-year extension of its preferential trade programme for Africa will deliver only a short-lived reprieve for the continent, analysts said, with South Africa's inclusion remaining tenuous amid strained diplomatic relations.】

item.title: 美国服务业1月原地踏步，新订单增速放缓
item.description: 美国服务业1月份保持稳定，但企业为投入品支付了更高成本，这表明在近几个月放缓趋势之后，服务业通胀可能加速上升。【原文：The U.S. services sector held steady in January, but businesses paid more for inputs, suggesting that services inflation could pick up after being on a slowing trend in recent months.】

item.title: 独家：亚马逊计划利用人工智能加速影视制作
item.description: 亚马逊计划利用人工智能加速影视制作流程，而好莱坞则担忧人工智能将导致岗位流失并永久性重塑整个行业。【原文：Amazon plans to use artificial intelligence to speed up the process for making movies and TV shows even as Hollywood fears that AI will cut jobs and permanently reshape the industry.】

item.title: 加拿大服务业PMI显示1月份行业衰退加速
item.description: 标准普尔全球周三公布的加拿大服务业采购经理人指数（PMI）数据显示，受贸易不确定性影响，1月份加拿大服务业经济下滑态势加剧，商业活动和新业务均出现萎缩。【原文：The downturn in Canada's services economy deepened in January as trade uncertainty contributed to declines in activity and new business, S&P Global's Canada services PMI data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥国家石油公司报告称2025年债务达845亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥国有石油公司佩梅克斯2025年财务负债总额为845亿美元，该公司首席执行官维克多·罗德里格斯·帕迪利亚周三在墨西哥总统克劳迪娅·谢恩鲍姆的每日晨间记者会上宣布。【原文：The 2025 financial debt of Mexico's state-owned oil firm Pemex, closed at $84.5 billion, the company's CEO Victor Rodriguez Padilla said on Wednesday during the daily morning press conference of Mexico's president Claudia Sheinbaum.】

item.title: 诺和诺德面临减肥药价格战风险，折扣压力加剧
item.description: 分析师和投资者表示，随着"史无前例"的价格压力迫使丹麦减肥药制造商诺和诺德削减其重磅药物Wegovy在美国市场的售价，该公司新任首席执行官面临在破坏性价格战中落败的风险。【原文：Danish obesity drug maker Novo Nordisk's new CEO risks being on the losing side of a damaging price war as "unprecedented" price pressure forces it to slash the cost of its blockbuster Wegovy drug in the United States, analysts and investors said.】

item.title: 万斯称美国将建立关键矿产价格下限制度
item.description: 美国副总统范斯周三在旨在促进关键矿产获取的50余国会议上表示，美国将建立为这些商品设定价格下限的机制。【原文：U.S. Vice President JD Vance told a meeting of than 50 countries on Wednesday aimed at boosting access to critical minerals that the U.S. will establish a system creating price floors for the commodities.】

item.title: 美国议员、Waymo和特斯拉敦促国会采取行动，加快自动驾驶汽车的部署。
item.description: 立法者、Waymo和特斯拉将敦促国会采取行动，推动长期搁置的立法进程，以加速自动驾驶汽车的部署，并警告来自中国的竞争威胁。【原文：Lawmakers, Waymo and Tesla will urge Congress to take action on long-stalled legislation to speed deployment of self-driving vehicles, warning of competitive threats from China.】

item.title: ElevenLabs以110亿美元估值完成5亿美元融资
item.description: 语音克隆人工智能初创公司ElevenLabs周三宣布，在最新融资轮中获得5亿美元资金后，公司估值已达110亿美元。【原文：Voice-cloning AI startup ElevenLabs has secured an $11 billion valuation after raising $500 million in its latest funding round, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉英国1月销量暴跌，中国竞争对手加速前进，新汽车数据显示
item.description: 新汽车周三发布的数据显示，特斯拉上月在英国的纯电动汽车销量不足中国竞争对手比亚迪的一半，这表明这家美国汽车制造商面临的竞争压力日益加剧。【原文：Tesla sold less than half the number of battery-electric vehicles recorded by Chinese rival BYD in the UK last month, data from New Automotive showed on Wednesday, pointing to mounting competitive pressures on the U.S. automaker.】

item.title: 伊塔乌银行、桑坦德银行和花旗银行达成协议，结束巴西税务纠纷
item.description: 巴西国家财政总检察长办公室（PGFN）近日与伊塔乌银行、桑坦德巴西银行和花旗银行达成和解协议，在过去几周内促成约24亿雷亚尔（4.5813亿美元）的税款缴纳。【原文：Brazil's National Treasury Attorney General's Office (PGFN) has reached settlement deals with lenders Itau , Santander Brasil and Citi that resulted in about 2.4 billion reais ($458.13 million) in tax payments in recent weeks.】

item.title: 《纽约时报》报道称《华盛顿邮报》将裁员数百名记者
item.description: 《纽约时报》周三援引员工视频会议消息报道称，《华盛顿邮报》计划裁减数百名记者。【原文：The Washington Post plans to lay off hundreds of journalists, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing a video call with employees.】
